info.name: interp bluenoise texture =danger
info.description:
Better seen in fullscreen.

top: nearest blue noise ( every sec: with threshold )
bottom: interpolated blue noise
left to right: noise scaled less to more than 1024.
click: offset all by 1/2 pixel.
switch #if line 7 to compare with whitenoise

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, U = u;
    if ( iMouse.z > 0. ) U -= .5;                       // click: offset by 1/2 pixel
    
    U /= 1024. -16.+32.* floor(u.x/R.x*8.)/8.;          // left to right: noise scaled by less to more than 1024.
#if 1                                                   // --- blue noise
    O = vec4( u.y/R.y > .5 ? texture(iChannel0,U).x     // top: nearest blue noise 
                           : texture(iChannel1,U).x );  // bottom: interpolated blue noise
#else                                                   // --- white noise
    U *= 4.;
    O = vec4( u.y/R.y > .5 ? texture(iChannel2,U).x     // top: nearest blue noise 
                           : texture(iChannel3,U).x );  // bottom: interpolated blue noise
#endif
    if ( fract(iTime/2.) < .5 ) O = step(.7,O);         // every sec: thresholding the noise 
    if ( mod( u.x,R.x/8.) < 1.) O = vec4(1,0,0,1);      // red separators
}
